cve_id.description: The Common Vulnerabilities and Exposures (CVE) ID.

url.description: The API URL for the advisory.

summary.description: A short summary of the advisory.

description.description: A detailed description of what the advisory entails.

created_at.description: The date and time of when the advisory was created, in ISO 8601 format.

updated_at.description: The date and time of when the advisory was last updated, in ISO 8601 format.

published_at.description: The date and time of when the advisory was published, in ISO 8601 format.

closed_at.description: The date and time of when the advisory was closed, in ISO 8601 format.

withdrawn_at.description: The date and time of when the advisory was withdrawn, in ISO 8601 format.

accepted.description: Whether a private vulnerability report was accepted by the repository's administrators.

items.description: A product affected by the vulnerability detailed in a repository security advisory.

package.description: The name of the package affected by the vulnerability.

ecosystem.description: The package's language or package management ecosystem.

name.description: The unique package name within its ecosystem.

vulnerable_version_range.description: The range of the package versions affected by the vulnerability.

patched_versions.description: The package version(s) that resolve the vulnerability.

vulnerable_functions.description: The functions in the package that are affected.

cwe_ids.description: A list of only the CWE IDs.

login.description: The username of the user credited.

type.description: The type of credit the user is receiving.

items.description: A credit given to a user for a repository security advisory.

type.description: The type of credit the user is receiving.

state.description: The state of the user's acceptance of the credit.

collaborating_users.description: A list of users that collaborate on the advisory.

collaborating_teams.description: A list of teams that collaborate on the advisory.

items.title: Team
items.description: Groups of organization members that gives permissions on specified repositories.

anyOf.title: Team Simple
anyOf.description: Groups of organization members that gives permissions on specified repositories.

permission.description: Permission that the team will have for its repositories

privacy.description: The level of privacy this team should have

notification_setting.description: The notification setting the team has set

ldap_dn.description: Distinguished Name (DN) that team maps to within LDAP environment

private_fork.description: A temporary private fork of the advisory's repository for collaborating on a fix.

id.description: A unique identifier of the repository.

node_id.description: The GraphQL identifier of the repository.

full_name.description: The full, globally unique, name of the repository.

html_url.description: The URL to view the repository on GitHub.com.

fork.description: Whether the repository is a fork.

url.description: The URL to get more information about the repository from the GitHub API.

archive_url.description: A template for the API URL to download the repository as an archive.

assignees_url.description: A template for the API URL to list the available assignees for issues in the repository.

blobs_url.description: A template for the API URL to create or retrieve a raw Git blob in the repository.

branches_url.description: A template for the API URL to get information about branches in the repository.

collaborators_url.description: A template for the API URL to get information about collaborators of the repository.

comments_url.description: A template for the API URL to get information about comments on the repository.

commits_url.description: A template for the API URL to get information about commits on the repository.

compare_url.description: A template for the API URL to compare two commits or refs.

contents_url.description: A template for the API URL to get the contents of the repository.

contributors_url.description: A template for the API URL to list the contributors to the repository.

deployments_url.description: The API URL to list the deployments of the repository.

downloads_url.description: The API URL to list the downloads on the repository.

events_url.description: The API URL to list the events of the repository.

forks_url.description: The API URL to list the forks of the repository.

git_commits_url.description: A template for the API URL to get information about Git commits of the repository.

git_refs_url.description: A template for the API URL to get information about Git refs of the repository.

git_tags_url.description: A template for the API URL to get information about Git tags of the repository.

issue_comment_url.description: A template for the API URL to get information about issue comments on the repository.

issue_events_url.description: A template for the API URL to get information about issue events on the repository.

issues_url.description: A template for the API URL to get information about issues on the repository.

keys_url.description: A template for the API URL to get information about deploy keys on the repository.

labels_url.description: A template for the API URL to get information about labels of the repository.

languages_url.description: The API URL to get information about the languages of the repository.

merges_url.description: The API URL to merge branches in the repository.

milestones_url.description: A template for the API URL to get information about milestones of the repository.

notifications_url.description: A template for the API URL to get information about notifications on the repository.

pulls_url.description: A template for the API URL to get information about pull requests on the repository.

releases_url.description: A template for the API URL to get information about releases on the repository.

stargazers_url.description: The API URL to list the stargazers on the repository.

statuses_url.description: A template for the API URL to get information about statuses of a commit.

subscribers_url.description: The API URL to list the subscribers on the repository.

subscription_url.description: The API URL to subscribe to notifications for this repository.

tags_url.description: The API URL to get information about tags on the repository.

teams_url.description: The API URL to list the teams on the repository.

trees_url.description: A template for the API URL to create or retrieve a raw Git tree of the repository.

hooks_url.description: The API URL to list the hooks on the repository.
